name: Wolverine
description: Wolverine (Logan) is a mutant with an accelerated healing factor and adamantium claws. Member of the X-Men.

name: Cyclops
description: Cyclops (Scott Summers) can emit powerful optic blasts from his eyes. Leader of the X-Men.

name: Storm
description: Storm (Ororo Munroe) has the power to manipulate weather. A key member of the X-Men.

name: Spider-Man
description: Spider-Man (Peter Parker) gained spider-like abilities from a bite. Active member of the Avengers.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man (Tony Stark) uses his advanced armor suit to fight evil. A prominent Avengers member.

name: Captain America
description: Captain America (Steve Rogers) was boosted to peak human performance by a serum. Leader of the Avengers.

name: Hulk
description: Hulk (Bruce Banner) transforms into a green powerhouse after gamma exposure. Core member of the Avengers.

name: Black Panther
description: Black Panther (T'Challa) has enhanced abilities from a rare herb. Ruler of Wakanda and Avengers member.

name: Doctor Strange
description: Doctor Strange (Stephen Strange) is the Sorcerer Supreme, mastering mystical powers. A vital Avengers asset.

name: Daredevil
description: Daredevil (Matt Murdock) was blinded but gained extraordinary senses. Fights crime in Hell's Kitchen.
